pmenu.menuNameKeymemo: multilingual translation key:eg:menu.system, do not need to fill in multilingual can be filled in
pmenu.linkMemo: If you select a backlink, the routing address needs to start with 'http(s)://'
pmenu.routePathmemo: The access route address, such as: 'user', if the external network address requires internal link access, it starts with 'http(s)://'
pmenu.componentPathmemo: The path of the accessed component, such as 'system/user/index', defaults to the 'views' directory
pmenu.permissionStrmemo: permission characters defined in the controller, such as: [ActionPermissionFilter(Permission = 'system:user:delete')]
pmenu.isCachememo: Select Yes and it will be cached by 'keep-alive', and the 'name' and address of the matching component need to be consistent
pmenu.isShowmemo: Select hide and the route will not appear in the sidebar, but will still be accessible
pmenu.menuStatememo: Select Deactivate and the route will not appear in the sidebar and cannot be accessed
